title: Nicole Scherzinger, 41, opts for retro styling ahead of glam Hollywood night on the town
text:
She's a global pop superstar with a sensational figure.

And Nicole Scherzinger stunned once again as she arrived at a party in Hollywood on Friday while donning a stunning blush pink two-piece.

The Pussycat Dolls singer, 41, was a vision as she rocked the trouser and shirt ensemble with a buttoned-up collar and waist sash.

Fabulous: Nicole Scherzinger stunned once again as she arrived at a party in Hollywood on Friday

Nicole nailed her elegant look for the night on the town, with the pink shade perfectly complementing her warm skin tone.

She paired her look with a cream evening bag and pointed heels, with the songstress giving a confident smile as she strode to the glitzy soiree.

Her look was further glammed-up with silver hoop earrings and shining gold rings on her fingers to make for the perfect accessories.

Nicole's make-up palette of light pink lipstick and deep eyeliner enhanced the radiant feel, while her raven tresses were swept behind her ears.

Confident air: The Pussycat Dolls singer, 41, was all smiles as she rocked a beige jumpsuit with a buttoned-up collar and waist sash

The Don't Hold Your Breath hitmaker's latest appearance comes after she turned up the heat up by slipping into a cobalt-blue bikini during a sun-soaked break with life coach friend Katie Morris.

Last month the singer returned as a judge for this year's X Factor, with a new trailer giving fans their first look at the show ahead of its launch next week.

Nicole is joined once more by Louis Walsh, 66, as they sit alongside Simon Cowell for the celebrity edition of the show, which has 15 celebrities from across the entertainment world competing for the top spot.

Cheery: Nicole recently enjoyed a sun-soaked break in a cobalt-blue bikini with life coach friend Katie Morris

The panel will remain a trio so that the show can hearken back to the ITV show's hey day, and in the trailer everyone seemed to be back to their best.

The star dated Formula One World Champion Lewis Hamilton from 2007 until 2015.

And in August she announced that she had split from her latest beau, tennis player Grigor Dimitrov.
